title: Bug 123044 - Preview attached file in PDF and the page break in the first item didn't happen.
description: Description: Preview attached file in PDF and the page break in the first item didn't happen. Steps to reproduce: 1.
OB: When previewing the attached file in PDF format, the page break in the first item does not occur.
EB: The first page should be blank because the first item is set to have a page break before it (pagebreakbefore = always).
SR: To reproduce: 1. Open the attached file. 2. Preview the file in PDF format. Check if the first page is blank or if the page break before the first item is correctly applied.
